impact-statement: Erastin and sorafenib inhibit system x<sub>c</sub><sup>-</sup> and induce ER stress, suggesting these may be useful tools for probing the functions of system x<sub>c</sub><sup>-</sup> and its role in inducing ER stress and ferroptosis.
